definition: a herder of sheep, often on an open range, tend as a shepherd, as of sheep or goats
details:
noun
- a herder of sheep, often on an open range
= example: a herder of sheep, often on an open range
= synonyms: sheepherder
- a clergyman who watches over a group of people
verb
- tend as a shepherd, as of sheep or goats
- watch over like a shepherd, as a teacher of her pupils
